alert.note: Alert for Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 10:58AM EST until further notice by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding along the Woonasquatucket River, and other nearby smaller streams. * WHERE...A portion of northeastern Rhode Island. * WHEN...Until 445 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying and flood prone areas along the Woonasquatucket River rivers is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1051 AM EST, Observations from the river gauge at Centerdale indicated the river was above flood stage as of late morning. The river is expected to crest early this afternoon before falling below flood stage later this afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Providence, North Providence, Johnston, Smithfield and Lincoln. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
